entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build fails on sln that contains a vcproj that references a CLR vcxproj #29088
  • Sdk tooling target framework should be net8.0 #29087
  • [release/7.0.2xx] System.NullReferenceException when running dotnet watch run #29085
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET 8 SDK installed, Warning "Workload garbage collection failed with error: An item with the same key has already been added. Key: (Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.android-arm, 6.0.10) displayed when installing andriod workload in CLI. #29082
  • 1stBug #29081
  • [NETE2ESDK]With .NET8.0 SDK installed, the default tfm should not be "net7.0" when creating project in CLI. #29080

Closed

  • Workload commandline resolver #11495
    Backlog
  • Running `dotnet workload install` sometimes installs newer workload versions with no way back #19077
    7.0.1xx
  • artifacts\sdk-build-env.bat for bash and set dotnet_root #10949
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [ASP.NET] Remove versions from baselines #29093
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix unhandled exception during test discovery on macOS #29083

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29020
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Retarget Microsoft.Extensions.DotNetDeltaApplier to netstandard2.1 #28984
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch
  • [release/7.0.2xx] fixed dotnet/templating#5600 "No templates found" when required parameter is missing #29079

Updated

  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update man pages post 7.0 GA #29032
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • Make all public API in dotnet-watch.dll internal and sealed. #28260
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2046490 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
